attributes.action: prevent the USA Phelps family (Homphobic protests at Soldiers funerals) from ever stepping on UK Soil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The USA Phelps family, part of Westboro Baptist Church were featured on BBC2 Sunday 1st April Louis Theroux : The Most Hated Family In America. 

They picket mourners at Soldiers funerals in the US, and protest against the US tolerance of homosexuality. 

They must not be allowed to ever enter UK soils and protest here where there actions would be probably illegal here anyway.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
